website_summaries.verdict: Dependable deal. Affordable choice for a filtered water bottle that's good for everyday use.
pros: Reduces chlorine and other chemicals from tap water
Great for airport travel and workouts
cons: Bottle must be squeezed for adequate water flow
Takes a lot of sucking force to drink
Leaking complaints from number of reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Product
customer_reviews.text: Tried this bottle on 2 recent trips. I grew tired of paying five bucks for a bottle of water in an airport, so I thought this might be a more environmentally and cost effective solution. IT IS! Went through TSA several times without incident (empty, of course). After going through security, I filled up at the water fountain, and presto! Great tasting water anywhere. It is durable, does not leak, and is easy to clean! Purchasing several more of these as gifts for friends.
customer_reviews.author: way2practical

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT purification water bottle. Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this water bottle purifier. Took these on vacations abroad and were able to fill empty water bottles anywhere. We travel ALOT and use these as portable britas. We take large water bottles with us and fill them using this container (simple squirt water into the larger one until its full). We no longer buy any water while traveling. There are replacement charcoal cartridges you can buy as well. BEST THING we bought for traveling. Saved us SO much money amd the water tastes great everywhere we have used it. Have bought more and HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money as you can't get a the full bottle
customer_reviews.text: The problem here is simple. The design is great in that they are smaller so they will fit in any holder or back pack slot but the issue is you can only drink less than 3/4's of the bottle as the filter length is so short that you can't get the water out. I found this to be so frustrating as I was traveling and did not want to buy bottled water but a few big gulps and that was all you can get. Dumb design. I wish the larger Brita 32oz water bottle with feeder had a smaller design where the straw/filter goes all the way to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Chrln

customer_reviews.title: i shouldnt have carried it on my Europe trip!
customer_reviews.text: i carried this on my Europe trip, and it was a bad decision! I gave it a lot of tries but this bottle is just a waste. Dont try to save money and buy this, it was just a burden to carry this around in my trip. It definitely is easy to clean, and probably also filters well, but it leaks when you try to drink water. also unless the bottle is full, it will not let you suck water. Also the lid got stuck to the sucker once, and pulled everything out while trying to open it, spilling water all over me at the airport!
customer_reviews.author: Ravi S.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good performer
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from a Brita product as I have used a Brita pitcher for many years. Very disappointed. It is difficult-to-impossible to get the filter out so I can't wash that part of the assembly. I find I have to squeeze with both hands to drink and that is hard to do on a treadmill or simply walking. The sport top is also hard to pull up, but perhaps that is helpful in reducing leakage. But imagine my surprise and dismay when today it started leaking around the screw-on top, which I had tightened as far as I could. On a positive note, the water tasted great: no plastic taste. Have ordered new bottles to try.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in durability!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed with this product. Ive had it 4 days, took it out once to go for a hike and 2 vital pieces to the top fell off both at seperate times... Now its useless because i cant take it out without it spilling. The pop top fell off within 1 hour of using and before I got home the other white twisy off top was gone. I was using the hook from the bottle and it was inside a pocket in my backpack so definitely not any abnormal jostling and the 2 pieces are completely gone rendering this a waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: MEGHAN LYNCH

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to drink out of
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this water bottle is not terrible. I bought it for a trip to Europe I took earlier this year (I wasn't sure how great the faucet water was in some of the countries). It served it's purpose, however you have to either suck really hard or squeeze the bottle pretty hard to get a decent amount of water out. Otherwise it's slow drinking. Again, it served it's purpose for the trip, but if you're looking for a bottle to use on a daily basis, I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seal tight, will leak!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one of these before that worked ok (slightly leaked), but this one does not seal at all. If you aren't careful and forget to tighten the lid as tightly as possible (I mean really twist it, way more than you'd think necessary), when you squeeze the bottle to drink the water spills all over you. This would be great as a gag gift, but I use it in the morning before school and twice the water spill has forced me to change my clothes making me late. I won't make the mistake of ordering this product again.
customer_reviews.author: scott davis

customer_reviews.title: Portable, clean water
customer_reviews.text: This thing goes in my purse so I always have it. There's something in tap water that makes me sick, so I'm restricted to bottled water. If I forgot to bring one with me I was outta luck. I love this bottle! The filtered water tastes really clean, and it takes care of whatever makes me sick. Its such a relief to be able to drink the water wherever I am. And the squeeze bottle is shatter-proof, which is great because I drop things a lot. No more lugging cases of bottles home groom the grocery store for me!
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: Infuriating
customer_reviews.text: I like this bottle for the most part. The problem is that it's impossible to drink the last 15-20% of water in the bottle. No matter how much you suck or squeeze you will get nothing but air out of it once it's about 80% empty. I find myself removing the lid to drink the last of the water, which defeats the purpose of the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Does filter well for 300+ uses but leaks
customer_reviews.text: This is a good concept but I think a few other similar products do it better. The filter does about 300 fills, so I used this at the gym for about 6-7 months before the filter needed to be changed, and it was cheaper to just buy a different filter bottle of its' type. Cheaper than bottled water, which is a nice money saving feature, it does leak, which is the reason I would not buy it again and rated it as 2 stars, but I would probably give it 2.5 since it did filter OK during that time, I just couldn't leave a partially filled bottle in my gym bag without it leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Nice filter.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my Brita water bottles. I bought this one to replace my old one that I had for years. I love this newer one. The filter is more solid and doesn’t have a bunch of holes where the charcoal can escape like the old one did. Much easier to keep clean. Update: I am now retracting 3 stars. My bottle, shortly after my original review, began to leak and I mean everywhere. Every time I drink I get a shower on my blouse. I am now ordering a different bottle from another brand. These bottles were so good before. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DNA

customer_reviews.title: Even Makes City Water Taste Good!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bottle for several months now to filter the nasty city water from the drinking fountain at work. Even that stuff tastes good through the filter! Much more environmentally friendly than buying bottled water from the vending machine and a lot cheaper in the long run! I do with the bottle was a little sturdier but it has held up well so far!
customer_reviews.author: William Bannier

customer_reviews.title: Not what's advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Advertised that it came with three replacement filters. It did not. It came with one installed and no replacements. I chose this bottle for the price based on the refills. As replacement filters cause more than the bottle-and I already had one. We were traveling over seas and needed two bottles with filters for clean water. Arrived two days before we left. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: v.rankin

customer_reviews.title: Money saving bottles! Water tastes good.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What money savers these are! We ordered 5 one for each of the family to use on our vacation in Florida. Filled each time never having to buy expensive water bottles. Can be used so many times! Took everywhere and every day.
customer_reviews.author: Thehectorb

customer_reviews.title: Good product that could use a little improvement
customer_reviews.text: I use this for travel. I absolutely dislike paying for water, especially at airports. This is a practical and suitable alternative to staying hydrated while traveling. The filter does a fantastic job of getting rid of tap water taste. I wish there was a version with a wide mouth and an attached spout cover so it prevents germs/dirt and won’t potentially pop off during vigorous movement.
customer_reviews.author: RCCC

customer_reviews.title: NOT dishwasher safe (even top rack), otherwise good product, but does not keep water cold
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for disney world. Never noticed water tasting bad, so the filters probably work fine. These don't keep water cold. Also, the packaging said they were dishwasher safe, so I put them on the top rack after we got back home, and they all melted. So that was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Staszak

customer_reviews.title: Probably wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't hold as much water as I expected and the filtering seems just OK. I brought it to work with me and it was kind of awkward as it's a squeeze bottle and makes a really loud noise as you are drinking from it. Probably wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: They really make the water taste great!
customer_reviews.text: We loved them!! We bought them because we were going to Disney world. And we have gone in the past and found out how awful their water from the water fountains is so we wanted to try to see if filtering the water would help. It was incredible, the water tastes great! And it was so light weight to carry in our backpacks. The handle was very convenient. It was the best decision. I totally recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Good travel water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for my family to take on a trip around the UK. They were great at filtering the weird taste out of tap water everywhere we went. I don’t travel without them now. An attached spout cover would be good. I lost mine somewhere in Rome. And I’d like a slightly larger size. Other than that their are great.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time using it, water does not come out of spout easily. I wanted to take off the lid to drink water but if I did then what good was the filter doing me? My head was killing me after trying to drink the water throughout the day, I was squeezing the bottle so hard to try and get it to flow.
customer_reviews.author: Long-Time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Did Its Job, Had a Handle.
customer_reviews.text: However, it tends to leak easy once it gets towards the top with water. The water seems a little cleaner, so hopefully the water fountain refills didn't hurt me. Need special cleaning brush for most of these, but this is strictly for water, so no prob there. Leaky some. Otherwise, it did its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Not for the office ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay water bottle, water taste good Sometime water leaks, which is a problem because I use this water bottle at my office. I assume would be okay if you were using it after a physical activity because it would not matter if you get water on you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for use in theme parks in Florida as I heard the water could sometimes taste funny. This worked like a charm. No leakage. I liked the hardness of the outside...some of the silicone ones can be overly squishy and hard to drink out of. It was nice to have the filter in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Ad Katz

customer_reviews.title: filters water great
customer_reviews.text: I love these bottles. I used them at Disney world to avoid spending crazy amounts on beverages. The tap water wasn't that great but once in the bottle it was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tyara M

customer_reviews.title: Used these while in Disney the filter came in handy ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these while in Disney the filter came in handy we didn't have to keep buying drinks at the parks
customer_reviews.author: RPen

customer_reviews.title: Too Hard to Drink From
customer_reviews.text: This bottle does a good job of filtering but you have to squeeze pretty hard to get the water out . It’s certainly not ideal for drinking when you are thirsty due to the low flow rate. The quality of the water is on par with most other Brita filters.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Advertising! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Deceptive advertising at its finest. The picture is of the newer Brita soft water bottle but the one that arrived was the old version with the old filter (white hard plastic) which hasn’t been around since 2015. Shame on the seller for false advertising and deceptive tactics. Don’t support this seller at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: they are great bottles and the color is really nice
customer_reviews.text: Have already ordered two of these over time, they are great bottles and the color is really nice. Be careful to not drop them and for those who complain about leaking, simply remove the loop and it stops leaking. The loop is its letdown!
customer_reviews.author: KragithZedrok

customer_reviews.title: Quality with expiration date
customer_reviews.text: First off I’ve had this bottle going on 3 years. Everything is good and works fine. It wasn’t until recently that the bottle constantly leaks and even worse started tasting like chlorine. I’ve washed it and always tighten it well but problems persist. I’ll be getting a new different bottle but this one has served well until recently.
customer_reviews.author: Erik the Wise

customer_reviews.title: Love this for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for a recent Disney trip, and they were fantastic. The bottle is lightweight and seals well, as long as you don't over-tighten! Containing 20 oz is good because a full bottle won't be as heavy as larger bottles, but the downside is you need to refill often. And, they aren't insulated...so water doesn't stay cold. However, none of those factors mattered to me, since I refilled quite often at the parks. I wanted a lightweight bottle with a filter, and this met every need for me.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Litz

customer_reviews.title: Great, but color listings may be off.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bottles, but beware of this listing as the color selection (photo vs actual color ordered) may be off. I thought I ordered the one with the print and got solid orange color instead. In terms of the filter - fabulous! Simple design, easy and cheap to replace. We didn’t know our water tasted a little weird until we used these and tried our water again unfiltered after a week or two. We drink all of our water out of these bottles now.
customer_reviews.author: RockSeeker

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Recieve What's Advertised
customer_reviews.text: What is advertised in all the photos and information here on the listing is the updated version of the water bottle, with a new filter style that does not fit in the old bottles. However, I was sent the old version of the water bottle, for which Brita no longer produces filters. I'm really irritated to say the least. I already own and old version of the bottle, and it's pretty much useless for being out and about, I didn't need another useless one. So I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Akasha Foust

customer_reviews.title: Filter only lasted 3 days
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. I bought one and had to return it after 4 days of use because it made the water taste like metal. I thought it may have just been a bad one so I got another and it only lasted 3 days before the water tasted like metal. I had several people try it just to make sure I wasn't the only one who tasted it and they all thought it tasted like metal as well. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Brita water bottle. Now, I can use one for home and one for travel! I have had different reusable bottles in the past, but this one seems to be a great fit for me. I like that I can control the water flow by squeezing the sides. And the handle makes it easy to grab in a hurry. When I am traveling, this filtered bottle gives me peace of mind when I drink water at different facilities. I have used them for several months now and they are still holding up fine!
customer_reviews.author: Vasuri

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I love using these water bottles for when I travel. No matter where I am, my water always takes really delicious and clean because of these water bottles. I’ve re-purchased them a bunch of times over the years, because I love them so much. Great for anyone who travels
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Overall the water quality is good, but I don't really like the texture of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Brita water filter at home for several years already and was surprised to find this brand finally has this water bottle with filter. Overall the water quality is good, but I don't really like the texture of the bottle itself. I know it is a sport water bottle which is supposed to be soft and easy to squeeze, but this plastic texture just looks cheap and taste not that wholesome :(
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe Lovewood

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first, then it just because a nothing. I never sipped from the head, I squeezed the water from it into another bottle. I leaked at some point, so it's just a practical eh...
customer_reviews.author: Steampunk-Scorpio

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and of poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 of these in less than one year. Each one quickly developed a leak. I contacted Brita, them seem to be aware of the defect, promised refunds, then changed their mind. Please consider avoiding. I am having much better luck with products from “refresh2go”, the quality seems much higher. No leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Gerome C.

customer_reviews.title: These were great for our trip to Disney
customer_reviews.text: These were great for our trip to Disney. I got some small clips to put on the handle so we could attach them to our backpacks and purses. It was nice having filtered water to drink all day every day! Well worth the money since we went to 4 parks on our trip!
customer_reviews.author: rookmag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Pro-Traveller
customer_reviews.text: I'm constantly traveling for work throughout airports and staying at hotels. It's hard to stay hydrated when I don't want to put my mouth near a bubbler or drink the tap water from the hotel bathroom. I really don't like paying for bottled water and add all that plastic to landfills either. I also really can't stand the taste of chlorinated water. The answer to my every drinking water problem is this water bottle! I don't have to worry about where I refill my water; the filter is going to neutralize the taste. With this it's easy for me to stay hydrated and not have to purchase bottle after bottle of water
customer_reviews.author: hello3030

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, fave water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I actually had this same one for 4+ years, held up and never broke. Still have it but i ordered a brand new one just to have 2. I love it so much! Fits everywhere, easy to carry, easy to replace filters. Love it way more than any clunky hard plastic waterbottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Reached out to amazon regarding the faulty product and they replaced it at not additonal charge to me. New bottle works perfectly. It leaks. Not something you can carry (filled) in a bag w/other things, everything would get wet. Leaks when you squeeze it to drink from the nozzle. It's messy. Total shame, it's a great idea
customer_reviews.author: 🌈🐾🖤

customer_reviews.title: New cap design makes bottle better.
customer_reviews.text: I've had about three or four of these brita bottles since they first came out. After they redesigned the cap/filter, I've found these bottles work much better. Older models would spill out water around the cap, but that design flaw seems to be fixed with their cap design changes. A must have for anyone who doesn't always have access to filtered water sources. Water tastes clean and crisp with clean filters.
customer_reviews.author: rr55404

customer_reviews.title: BE WARNED: Replacement filters for these bottles have been ...
customer_reviews.text: BE WARNED: Replacement filters for these bottles have been discontinued! If you purchase the soft squeeze bottle, you might not be able to find filters for it in the future. Brita water bottle filters sold in the black box DO NOT fit this bottle. Those filters are designed to fit the hard-sided bottle they now sell. Amazon does have a few of the old filters in stock but they are very expensive (currently a pack of 2 for $20).
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Filters water but leaks when you're using it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a water bottle to bring with me to the gym, and I seen this bottle. I love the brita pitcher so I figured I would buy this since its cheap, and would filter the water from the gym if I needed a refill. The reason why I'm giving it 2 stars is because it does filter the water, but it doesn't function too well as a waterbottle due to it leaking from the lid whenever you squeeze it to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: SebbyC

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: After a while it did have problems with leaking and I had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wesztergom

customer_reviews.title: Traveling water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a Europe trip and it worked wonderfully. It was the right size and fit in my purse as I trekked through France and it was nice that it had a filter. I didn’t have a big need for the filter but it was comforting to know if I needed it I had it.
customer_reviews.author: N J

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's suppose to
customer_reviews.text: Holds water, obviously doesn't keep it very cool, but it's fine if you just need a cheap one to carry around. We've upgraded to higher end stuff, but this gets the job done for my son and worked well for my wife when she used it for biking.
customer_reviews.author: TheMimbo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT...BUT IT DOES LEAK
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bottle for traveling, as some places have have heavily chlorinated tasting water. Works great as the chlorine taste is greatly reduced if not eliminated. The bottle does leak as reported but only if you squeeze the bottle from between the middle and top of the bottle (for this reason I gave it 4 stars I would actually give it 4 1/2 stars if it was possible). If I squeeze from the bottom it does not leak. It's a good product that I will continue to use but I just have to be mindful of where I squeeze or I'll end up withe water streaming down the middle of my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: wchiro

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value, we like to keep filtering water bottles at our bedside to save us getting out of bed when thirsty at night. This does the trick, and does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: cat e

customer_reviews.title: Sport Water Bottle Disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: First, I'll say I love the Brita pitcher I purchased at the same time. The sport bottle, however, is a big disappointment. It's awkward to drink from, plastic is too hard to squeeze and the top cap doesn't pop off without a struggle. I'm trying to avoid buying little bottles of water and thought this would be a good alternative. It's not. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Easy to Carry
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use filtered water bottle. I liked that it had the optional plastic ring so that you can hang it on stuff. I did find it a bit annoying to suck the water through the filter but it got the job done - provided me with clean water.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah j

customer_reviews.title: It leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I would love this water bottle except it leaks when I try to drink from it. I can't use my mouth to suck the water out alone because to much air comes in so I have to squeeze the bottle to get a good flow of water. Disappointed by this bottle. Ive tried to figure out how to stop the leak but cant!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Instant Brita water in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: This product won't save you if you're in the Amazon (get the joke.... :D ) but it makes crappy water tastes great! Some people say it's hard to squeeze but it's a squeeze bottle it's not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Yates

customer_reviews.title: Useless water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good purchase. You cannot even drink the whole bottle of water because once it gets to the edge of the filter (about 3”) the water will not flow through the filter.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Mack

customer_reviews.title: water tasted great, and saved me lots of money
customer_reviews.text: I recently went to an industry trade show, taking this water bottle with me. Normally, I would be at the mercy of the convention center concession stands and their $4 bottles of water if I wanted decent tasting water. Not any more! I was able to fill this Brita filter bottle from a water fountain and go. No leaks, water tasted great, and saved me lots of money!
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie McCullers

customer_reviews.title: Pictures show newer model, but old model shipped
customer_reviews.text: The picture and description of the item show the newer model bottle (notice loop and filter), but the old version was shipped. I specifically bought it as the old filters are hard to come by anymore. Will be returning this!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Weird plastic taste
customer_reviews.text: Started to develop a gross plastic taste after a month of use. I’ve used plenty of plastic water bottles that didn’t have that problem. Would not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: DMV4L

customer_reviews.title: Decent little water bottle
customer_reviews.text: My little cousin said "cool water bottle" so it's a winner in my book. Seems to filter the water just fine and doesn't leak as bad as the hard sided Brita bottle I have. Not perfect but good enough. It's a decent water bottle at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love brita
customer_reviews.text: I love brita bottles and these are perfect for me in college so I dont have to keep buying water bottles and can be a little more envronmentally friendly while getting my water filtered.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia W.

customer_reviews.title: Cap starts to smell and water comes out slow
customer_reviews.text: Coming from the WaterU fresh ship decided to mix it up with this bottle as I got tired of the straw falling out in that one. Boy was I disappointed. This is probably the worst thing I've ever purchased. After only a week with regular washing the cap area begins to smell. Combine that with a slow exit of the water that really requires squeezing of the bottle I will look elsewhere. Live and learn, I guess. Avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Eheaps

customer_reviews.title: so I'll be getting another one.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it used it on cruise and in different counties in Europe, So upset that morning I was leaving my cruise I left it in the room (the single thing I forgot) so I'll be getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lina A Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water bottle as a cheap replacement for a different brand more expensive water bottle that I had dropped and broke. I live in Milwaukee Wisconsin and we already have awesome water, but occasionally our water has an unusual taste. Since I have had this water bottle I have not noticed the taste. Other users have said that their water bottles leak because of the rubber strap. I have not had this issue. The water bottle is great and is small enough to be taken everywhere. I definitely notice myself drinking water more because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Bottle!  No Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: I see other reviews that complained about leaks, and other reviews that indicated that there are two places to tighten the top and if you tighten both of them, you won't have leaks. Well the second group was correct - they don't leak, the water tastes great, and we use them all of the time. The filters last about a month (at least before we change them) and it's about the best water bottle my wife and I have ever used. If lost, I'd buy another one instantly. These are simply great, easy to carry with the removable handle, and a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Harsen

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy-- waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Brita is usually a good company and I really like their home-use water pitchers, but this turned out to be a major dud. It leaks really badly, no matter how much you tighten it. Also, the idea of squeezing the water out is ridiculous, in my opinion. Do yourself a favor and skip this-- get the bigger gravity-operated filter and just make more room for it in your travel bags on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: songsinc

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel/hiking/camping
customer_reviews.text: Good item, purchased for Disney trip & was able to hang it off of my backpack & refill with fountain water since it had its own filter.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Wish the mouthpiece was made of sturdier material
customer_reviews.text: I like everything except for the spout. The plastic on the drinking spout is very soft and one small nick from a tooth or fingernail shows damage to it. I've had my bottle for a couple months now and the white spout looks all damaged with little lines and nicks even though I take good care of it. Then, as a female, my lipstick settles into the lines/damaged areas and I have to wash it constantly. Would be better if the mouthpiece was made of a sturdier material. Other than that the bottle does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the Disposable Bottles with This Built-In Filter Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Like not having to worry as much about drinking tap water on the go thanks to this bottle’s built-in filter. Definitely make sure to follow instructions about rinsing new filter before first use; it’ll look like dirty water but eventually clears up after 10-15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not usable for unclean water abroad
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this could help out when traveling to areas with unclean water but the small print says it’s not to be used for that
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walters

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea
customer_reviews.text: I find this a bit hard to get water out of & I also hate the idea of using my hand or teeth to pull top up to drink.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Water smells after being in the bottle And the bottel smells as well The design is horrible Poor quality control Waste of money 💰 I was very disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very consistent product... at leaking all over my pants every single time I take a sip.
customer_reviews.text: The top seal between the cover and the filter leaks every time I take a sip. I used to get water all over my clothes each and every time I used it. Now I just look very silly leaning over to the side to take a sip while water trickles all over the floor. What you save in plastic bottles, you lose in paper towels. Spend the extra $5 and get a better, leak-proof product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I love these bottles. It feels good to not use plastic bottles. Only things is needs to squeeze furcwater to come out. Taste is same as whatever you put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: I used to have to lug a case of water ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to lug a case of water bottles to work and felt guilty of all the plastic empties. Now, no carting heavy water bottle cases, my bottle is kept at work ready for my use, I have clean drinking water (ya never know what's in those prepackaged water bottles), and I'm leaving a smaller carbon footprint. YEA!
customer_reviews.author: Sharonlh

customer_reviews.title: the idea is good, the design is very nice
customer_reviews.text: the idea is good, the design is very nice, the material is durable, but the functionality is ... nah. its hard to get water out and sometimes the filter leaks out some of the insides out into the nozzle .
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Zamboanga

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: I can't even give it 2 stars. It's extremely cheap, doesn't work well and I don't see how it could be filtering anything out. The amount of leakage randomly (because it doesn't stay sealed) is astonishing and extremely annoying. Don't buy this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So so, I was not overly impressed. I ...
customer_reviews.text: So so, I was not overly impressed. I was not able to tell the difference in water taste at all. Once bottle is empty, small amount of water pools in bottom of the filter assembly and that makes me little uneasy on water quality. Takes bit of the effort to squeeze the water out of the bottle. The rubber handle is ok for holding the bottle but it is not integrated to design meaning it falls off once the cover is removed. Overall I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P.

customer_reviews.title: I bring it every where and feel like SpongeBob when he first goes in Sandy's house if ...
customer_reviews.text: I bring it every where and feel like SpongeBob when he first goes in Sandy's house if I leave it at home. Don't leave it in your car or your water will be lava hot. I wash it in the dishwashers and iced had it for over a year. It does make a noise when your drinking but they all do.
customer_reviews.author: Doyle

customer_reviews.title: This water bottle is okay. The water doesn't flow ...
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is okay. The water doesn't flow very well with the filter in, and the water bottle is already leaking (although that may be because I accidentally washed it on the bottom rack of the dishwasher instead of the top rack?)
customer_reviews.author: Vanilly

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling so you don't have to constantly buy water. Sometimes leaks a little
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Way too difficult to drink from.
customer_reviews.text: Who wants to put this much effort into drinking water? Terrible product. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Big Al Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This is not a bad water bottle it works well and everything
customer_reviews.text: This is not a bad water bottle it works well and everything. Personally I just prefer to drink out of a straw and not have to tip the bottle to get the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for our trip to Florida. They have lasted the last 5 months. Water taste great and stays cold. Love these water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Received used bottle
customer_reviews.text: Received used bottle, missing filter and cap. Filthy tape holding top on.
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great water bottle that does allow me to get water ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water bottle that does allow me to get water where ever I got and not worry about having different tastes. The only drawback I didn't realize is that since it is the 'sport' version, it does require squeezing to get the water to come out. I might look in the future to get one that will just pour or not have the lovely squirting sounds...
customer_reviews.author: mdenney

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: The bottle definitely leaks. I used the bottle for about a week before I gave up on it. I thought I figured out the leaking problem, and I was being very careful about screwing both lids on. Then, one day after having no problems at all, the bottle leaked water all over me while I was at work. I think the problem is where the filter sits inside. There's no threading, so there's no way to make sure that it's sealed completely.
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: Great to use on cruise or anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste with sink water from our bathroom cruise ship!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Bought the for my Disney trip to use at the parks. Works great and the water taste great. I will continue to use this everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my sister because I love (and use) mine so much. Great for hiking, at the gym or just at-home use. We have a faucet filter, but I love the extra filter right in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: lunarchi

customer_reviews.title: ehhhhhhh....
customer_reviews.text: although the quality of the water may very well be great as I expect from a brita filter.... I do not like the faint rubber/plastic-y quality... I am perhaps quite sensitive to taste and smell..and as much as I wanted this to work for me.. I find i am not using it as much as I am drinking water..... I always have a water with me.. in the car, shopping...whereever... this is kinda convenient.... because I can refill in any fountain... but i have also left it at my friends..and had to go back and retrieve it... sooo.. Im weighing in... its a great product... but just not so much for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jana Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Nice blue
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle. Filter tasted funny after getting warm. Took out the filter and it is a great water bottle
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin P.

customer_reviews.title: ... plastic bottle of water from the fridge but definitely better for the environment
customer_reviews.text: not as convenient as opening up a plastic bottle of water from the fridge but definitely better for the environment. water taste is decent. my 6 years olds have to pull a bit harder on the cap and suck a bit harder and complain a bit. but overall still decent. you have to squeeze the bottle to get water out. does the job. probably a bit overpriced
customer_reviews.author: K. Puthawala, S.Naseer

customer_reviews.title: I can only drink about three quarters of this bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: I can only drink about three quarters of this bottle. for the rest, you need to open up the bottle to sip it. Completely defeats the point. I would be okay if it was only a few sips, but when you can't drink a quarter of this bottle, it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the wallet, and great for the environment!
customer_reviews.text: Made it possible to drink the tap water at Disneyworld, which otherwise had a very unpleasant taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lindyk

customer_reviews.title: We love these water bottles
customer_reviews.text: We love these water bottles, they are perfect for the active family who wants to drink truly clean water. We plan on bringing them with us on vacation in the Bahamas soon as we won't go anywhere without them. The filters last a good while and are fairly inexpensive if purchased on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: They Call me Bob

customer_reviews.title: Love Brita
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Brita water bottles for years. Unfortunately, they're getting harder to find in stores. My old one leaked, but I've put this one only in the top rack of the dishwasher, and so far, no leaks!
customer_reviews.author: funmolly212

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have when traveling so you’re not paying for water in the hotel all the time. Really improves the taste.
customer_reviews.author: M116

customer_reviews.title: Durable nice water bottle. Fam approved 💧
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle's, have a few🙂Not sure how well the filters work, but think I need new ones.. Don't know how to tell I need new ones..
customer_reviews.author: Just Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money. The last few ounces will not go through the filter. You have to have the bottle full up to a certain point to be able to squeeze water out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

product_meta.title: 20 Ounce Sport Water Bottle with Filter - BPA Free
feature_bullets: FILTER ON THE GO: The filter inside the soft squeeze, BPA free bottle filters as you drink to easily rehydrate during gym workouts or sports practice.
BETTER TASTING: The sport bottle filters and reduces chlorine taste and odor found in tap water as you drink.
CONVENIENT: The built-in carrying loop and easy-sip spout make this the perfect travel water bottle for when you're at the gym, hiking, or on the go.
REDUCE WASTE: One water filter can replace up to 300 standard 16.9 ounce water bottles, keep you hydrated, save you money, and reduce plastic waste.
CARE DETAILS: Water bottle is top rack dishwasher safe and for optimum performance, filter should be replaced every 40 gallons or every two months.
